short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Gives you quick ideas for creating magical items on the fly

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Creating magical items can become quite difficult when you don't have any basis to go of. This Chrome extension provides quick and easy context for creating interesting and unique magical items on the fly. Remember that it will not create one for you, though. It will simplify the process by picking some parameters, however the creating work of tying everything together will be up to you.
